oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NIGERIAN LITERATURE IN FRENCH TRANSLATION (NILIFT)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Madueke, Ijeoma Sylvia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A comprehensive list of Nigerian texts translated and published in French. Data includes place and year of publication both in English and French as well as names of translators.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arts and Humanities
Nigerian Literature, Translation, French, Africa
